idea-plugin.name: Quick Notes
idea-plugin.description:
Quick Notes plugin provides ability to quickly save notes within IDEA. This plugin allows managing multiple notes. Please save your existing notes before upgrading (just in case).

For any bugs or suggestions, please leave a comment on the plugin page at
http://plugins.intellij.net/plugin/?id=4456

Change Log

Version 2.6

  • Compiled with JDK 5
  • New note's title is now set to current date and time
  • New ability to change the font and font size
  • New ability to place toolbar at top or bottom position
  • Added options dialog to manage various settings

Version 2.5.1

  • Fixed a bug with focusing of Note in multiple IDEA instances

Version 2.5

  • Note is no more locked when opened in multiple IDEA instances. Just a warning is shown.
  • Note is kept in sync in real time when opened in multiple IDEA instances.
  • All opened IDEA instances are now kept in sync when a Note is Added, Deleted or Renamed.

Version 2.4

  • Bug fix for Line number alignment (thanks WarnerJan)
  • Added popup menu to editor

Version 2.3
The data is now saved in a file under user's home directory under folder ".ideaquicknote" and if for some reason the saving of data fails then data is saved in the plugin's internal storage. QuickNotes is now also compatible with multiple IDEA instances. Please save your existing notes before upgrading to this version (just in case).

  • Data is now saved in user's home directory
  • Shows line numbers with an ability to hide it
  • Compatible with multiple IDEA instances
  • Minor UI tweaks
